civil_war_questline.name: The Civil War
civil_war_questline.description: Choose a side in Skyrim's bloody conflict between the Imperial Legion and the Stormcloaks
civil_war_questline.branching_structure: Quests differ based on chosen faction

shared.name: Joining the Legion
shared.description: Join the Imperial Legion under General Tullius
objectives: Speak to General Tullius or Legate Rikke

shared.name: Joining the Stormcloaks
shared.description: Join the Stormcloak Rebellion under Ulfric Stormcloak
objectives: Speak to Ulfric Stormcloak or Galmar Stone-Fist

imperial_version.name: Battle for Whiterun (Imperial)
objectives: Stage 0: Attend the War Room Briefing at Dragonsreach
Stage 1: Repel Stormcloak infiltrators inside Dragonsreach and secure the bridge
Stage 2: Push through Cloud District stairs and protect the Wind District
Stage 3: Confront Ralof at the Gildergreen and resolve his fate
Stage 4: Stabilize the Wind District and route remaining Stormcloak squads
Stage 5: Break the Stormcloak spearpoint at the main gatehouse

downtime_stage.name: War Room Briefing (Dragonsreach)
downtime_stage.setup: General Tullius orders the PC to report to Dragonsreach. Jarl Balgruuf has committed to the Empire. Legate Rikke and Legate Cipius prepare defenses as the Stormcloak host gathers outside the walls.

bonding_beats.prompt: Balgruuf sizes you up. He asks why you fight, and whether you understand what it costs to keep a Hold standing.

approaches.Rapport: Earn a personal nod and a public acknowledgment at the end of the battle.
approaches.Empathy: Spot Balgruuf's hesitation and offer him a clean, principled rationale.
approaches.Provoke: Dare him to be the Jarl his people believe he is (high risk, high reward).

bonding_beats.prompt: Hadvar checks straps and steel, then checks you. "Same side again, then?"

approaches.Rapport: Lock in trust: Hadvar will take a consequence for you once this battle.
approaches.Tactics: Coordinate roles: gain 1 free invoke on "Prepared Kill-Zones" in Stage 1.

backstory_resonance.bonus: +1 to the first teamwork roll with Hadvar

bonding_beats.prompt: Irileth wants certainty. "If the walls break, the Jarl dies. Tell me you can hold a line."

approaches.Will: Win her respect by refusing to flinch.
approaches.Fight: Offer a concrete battle plan in two sentences.
approaches.Lore: Identify Stormcloak siege methods and likely breach points.

bonding_beats.reward: If successful, Irileth grants a tactical boon: 1 free invoke on "Whiterun Guard Elite" in Stage 2.

compel_hooks: Compel: "Duty Before Comfort" (report early, give up personal prep)
Compel: "Old Friend, New War" (backstory ties complicate orders)

stages.name: Sneak Attack: Dragonsreach Breach
stages.objective: Repel infiltrators inside Dragonsreach and push them back across the bridge.
stages.inciting_event: Commander Caius staggers in with his men: "Greymane opened a postern. They're inside!" Before Cipius can verify, Stormcloaks strike within the hall.

opposition.notes: If party is under-leveled, scale officer down to Good (+3) with elite bodyguards as hazards.

encounters.twist: 1 disguised attacker emerges from a "Trusted Servant" aspect unless discovered.

encounters.stakes: Capture vs kill determines interrogation intel for Stage 2-3.

impact.kill: No intel; Stormcloaks gain +1 momentum next stage.
impact.capture: Gain intel aspect "Greymane Contact" (1 free invoke) and reduce Stage 2 opposition by 1.
impact.forced_retreat: Officer escapes; ticks Hadvar/Ralof rivalry clock +1.

stages.completion_trigger: Bridge secured and infiltrators routed; Balgruuf remains alive and uninjured.

stages.name: Down to the Wind District
stages.objective: Break through Stormcloak pressure down the Cloud District steps and prevent the Wind District from collapsing.

special_tasks.task: Escort trapped civilians behind guard lines (Athletics/Physique/Rapport).
special_tasks.reward: Balgruuf trust +5; 1 FP if you accept the "Citizens in Danger" compel.

special_tasks.task: Keep the Temple of Kynareth from being torched (Will/Crafts).
special_tasks.reward: Blessing boon: +1 to first recovery roll after battle.

stages.completion_trigger: You arrive at the Wind District line intact with at least one task resolved OR the enemy push halted.

stages.name: Hadvar vs Ralof: Same Coin, Different Stamp
stages.objective: Confront Ralof and decide his fate: kill, capture, turn, or let him flee.

impact.killed: Dragonbreak precheck if Ralof is major-canon ally; Hadvar loyalty +5 / morality cost aspect.
impact.captured: Gain aspect "Prisoner of War"; Stormcloak momentum -2.
impact.turned: Rare: requires high Rapport + backstory resonance; sets flag "Ralof Doubts".
impact.escaped: Ralof becomes recurring rival; ticks rivalry clock +2.

stages.completion_trigger: Ralof is resolved (killed/captured/turned/escaped) and the Wind District line stabilizes.

stages.name: Stabilize the Wind District
stages.objective: Push remaining Stormcloak squads out of the inner district and prevent looting/sabotage.
stages.completion_trigger: Enemy squads routed; at least one special task resolved OR the party chooses to press to the gates.

stages.name: Gatehouse Climax: Break the Spearpoint
stages.objective: Defeat the Stormcloak spearpoint at the gates: Galmar and/or Vignar's strike team.

dragonbreak_precheck.why: Major civil war canon fracture; changes multiple holds' war tempo.
Whiterun succession fracture; Companions + Gray-Mane fallout.

stages.completion_trigger: Gatehouse secured and the Stormcloak spearpoint broken.

combat_encounters.description: Stormcloak infantry assault the main gate

hadvar.role: Provides tactical support and morale boost
hadvar.bonuses: +1 to all defend actions when fighting alongside Hadvar
hadvar.special_ability: Shield Brother stunt applies to all party members in his zone
hadvar.dialogue: Hadvar fights alongside the party, using his Imperial training to coordinate defenses and inspire troops

rewards.hadvar_loyalty: +15 if Hadvar is present and survives

stormcloak_version.name: Battle for Whiterun (Stormcloak)
stormcloak_version.description: Attack Whiterun and take the city for the Stormcloaks
objectives: Stage 0: Attend Ulfric's Pre-Battle Briefing at the war camp
Stage 1: Breach the outer barricades and eliminate the Imperial officer
Stage 2: Navigate the drawbridge lever route and push into the Plains District
Stage 3: Press through the Plains District and secure key positions
Stage 4: Reach the Wind District and confront Hadvar at the Gildergreen
Stage 5: Storm Dragonsreach and force surrender or combat climax

pre_battle_briefing.name: War Camp Briefing
pre_battle_briefing.setup: Ulfric Stormcloak addresses his commanders. Galmar Stone-Fist sets the tactical plan. Ralof falls in alongside the PC.

bonding_beats.prompt: Ulfric speaks to the warriors before the battle. He turns to the PC last: "You've earned your place here. Tell me - what does Skyrim mean to you?"

approaches.Rapport: Earn Ulfric's personal respect: +1 to rolls in his presence this battle.
approaches.Provoke: Rouse the gathered warriors into a frenzy: all Stormcloaks gain +1 to Stage 1 attack rolls.
approaches.Will: Show quiet resolve: Ulfric grants a single-use "Ulfric's Trust" free invoke.

backstory_resonance.bonus: +1 to the first social roll involving Stormcloak NPCs this session

bonding_beats.prompt: Galmar runs through the tactical plan and ends with: "You and Ralof take the postern. Think you can handle that without dying?"

approaches.Tactics: Impress Galmar with a tactical insight: gain aspect "Sharp Eyes on the Approach" (1 free invoke).
approaches.Rapport: Earn a gruff acknowledgment: Galmar covers your flank in Stage 1.
approaches.Provoke: Dare Galmar to lead from the front (risky - he might steal the glory, but the push is stronger).

bonding_beats.prompt: Ralof falls in beside you. "Side by side again. Just like we always said we'd stand." He means it.

approaches.Rapport: Cement the bond: Ralof gains Shield Brother equivalent for Stormcloak attacks.
approaches.Empathy: Notice his edge of doubt and address it: prevents the rivalry clock ticking on a bad Stage 4 outcome.

backstory_resonance.bonus: +1 to the first teamwork roll with Ralof

scene_aspects: The City Waits - And So Does History
compel_hooks: Compel: "Old Wounds" (someone from the party's past is inside those walls)
Compel: "For Skyrim!" (heroic impulse overrides tactical caution on first assault)

stages.name: Breach the Outer Barricades
stages.objective: Overrun the Imperial outer barricades and eliminate the commanding officer.

opposition.notes: Galmar leads the main assault; PC and Ralof handle the officer.

encounters.twist: A ballista on the wall creates a zone hazard until disabled (Crafts or Shoot).

encounters.stakes: Killing vs capturing the officer affects Imperial morale in later stages.

impact.kill: Imperial morale -1 for Stage 2; no intel.
impact.capture: Gain intel aspect "Gate Codes Extracted" (reduces Stage 2 drawbridge difficulty by 1).
impact.forced_retreat: Officer alerts inner defenders; Stage 2 opposition +1.

stages.completion_trigger: Outer barricades overrun and Imperial officer resolved.

stages.name: The Drawbridge Push
stages.objective: Reach and operate the drawbridge lever to allow the main Stormcloak force entry.

impact.direct_assault: High cost; Stormcloak casualties +2 but lever reached quickly.
impact.stealth_flanking: Requires Athletics/Stealth; lever reached with minimal losses.
impact.distraction_gambit: Ralof creates a diversion; PC slips through (Rapport/Deceive vs Good).

commander_choice.prompt: Galmar asks who should lead the main push into the Plains District once the gate opens.
commander_choice.notes: References npc_stat_commander_caius and npc_stat_legate_cipius as Imperial commanders intercepting.

stages.completion_trigger: Drawbridge lever pulled; main Stormcloak force pours through the gate.

stages.name: Plains District Push
stages.objective: Sweep through the Plains District, secure key nodes, and complete available side tasks.

district_nodes.task: Secure the Bannered Mare as a field hospital / command post.
district_nodes.reward: +1 Stormcloak momentum; wounded troops recover 1 consequence.

district_nodes.task: Secure Warmaiden's forge for weapon repair and supplies.
district_nodes.reward: Loot aspect: "Skyforge-Quality Repairs" (1 free invoke on equipment this battle).

loot_hooks: Imperial supply crates: 50 gold + minor enchanted gear
Battle-Born strongbox: documents relevant to Thalmor sub-plot (optional discovery)
stages.completion_trigger: Plains District secured with at least one district node held.

stages.name: Wind District: Ralof vs Hadvar
stages.objective: Reach the Wind District and resolve the Hadvar confrontation.
stages.rivalry_escalation: This stage ticks the hadvar_ralof_rivalry clock by 1 regardless of outcome.

impact.killed: Dragonbreak precheck if Hadvar is major-canon ally; Ralof loyalty +5 / morality cost aspect.
impact.turned: Rare: requires high Rapport + backstory resonance; sets flag "Hadvar Doubts".
impact.escaped: Hadvar becomes recurring rival; ticks rivalry clock +2.

stages.completion_trigger: Hadvar resolved and Wind District line broken.

stages.name: Dragonsreach Climax
stages.objective: Breach Dragonsreach and force Jarl Balgruuf to surrender or be defeated in combat.

climax_routes.description: Fight through Irileth's elite guard and confront Balgruuf directly.
Balgruuf yields if Irileth is defeated and all escape routes are cut off.
climax_routes.trigger: Irileth taken out + all exits controlled.

climax_routes.description: Rare: PC with Ulfric's Trust + high Rapport offers Balgruuf an honorable exile rather than death.
climax_routes.requirements: "Ulfric's Trust" aspect + Rapport roll vs Superb (+5)
climax_routes.outcome: Balgruuf accepts exile peacefully; Vignar installed without bloodshed; massive reputation gain.

dragonbreak_precheck.why: Whiterun succession crisis; Companions + citizens' fallout.
Dark Brotherhood / Dunmer community ripple; unique recruitable NPC lost.

stages.completion_trigger: Dragonsreach secured; Balgruuf surrendered, fled, or defeated.

ralof.role: Provides morale boost and rallying support
ralof.bonuses: +1 to all attack actions when fighting alongside Ralof
ralof.special_ability: For Skyrim! stunt can be used twice in this battle
ralof.dialogue: Ralof leads charges alongside the party, rallying Stormcloak troops and demonstrating Nord fury in combat

rewards.ralof_loyalty: +15 if Ralof is present and survives

liberation_of_skyrim_falkreath.name: Liberation of Skyrim: Falkreath
liberation_of_skyrim_falkreath.description: With Whiterun secured for the Stormcloaks, Ulfric orders the liberation of Falkreath Hold from Imperial control.
liberation_of_skyrim_falkreath.stub_notes: Continuation quest placeholder. Full staging TBD in future patch.

reunification_of_skyrim_falkreath.name: Reunification of Skyrim: Falkreath
reunification_of_skyrim_falkreath.description: With Whiterun secured for the Empire, General Tullius orders the reunification drive through Falkreath Hold.
reunification_of_skyrim_falkreath.stub_notes: Continuation quest placeholder. Full staging TBD in future patch.

liberation_of_skyrim_the_pale.name: Liberation of Skyrim: The Pale
liberation_of_skyrim_the_pale.description: Stormcloak forces push into The Pale to capture Dawnstar.

reunification_of_skyrim_the_pale.name: Reunification of Skyrim: The Pale
reunification_of_skyrim_the_pale.description: Imperial forces push into The Pale to pacify Dawnstar.

major_battles.name: The Jagged Crown
major_battles.description: Retrieve the ancient crown of Skyrim's High Kings
major_battles.significance: Symbol of legitimacy for either faction

major_battles.name: Compelling Tribute
major_battles.description: Intimidate neutral Jarls into supporting your faction

major_battles.name: Battle for Fort Dunstad
major_battles.description: Capture or defend a strategic fort

major_battles.name: Battle for Solitude (Stormcloak ending)
major_battles.description: Final assault on the Imperial capital of Skyrim

major_battles.name: Battle for Windhelm (Imperial ending)
major_battles.description: Final assault on the Stormcloak capital

quest_structure_notes.branching_point: Battle of Whiterun is the major turning point
quest_structure_notes.parallel_quests: Each side has mirror quests with different perspectives
quest_structure_notes.integration_with_main_quest: Can be completed before, during, or after main quest
quest_structure_notes.peace_option: Season Unending quest offers temporary truce
